data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Shariatpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shariatpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Shariatpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,448 believers in Shariatpur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Shariatpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jotdar people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, make the church in Shariatpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Shariatpur. Through your servants plant 231 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,448 believers in Shariatpur that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Shariatpur
location.people_groups_list: Kaghazi, Kaora, Jat (Muslim traditions), Jamadar, Jogi (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kaghazi (2,200), Kaora (5,100), Jat (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Jamadar (300), Jogi (Muslim traditions) (5,000)
